actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To amend section 8 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to waive the requirement that a family receiving project-based rental assistance be notified one year in advance of termination of the contract for such assistance in cases in which such termination facilitates purchase of the home by the tenant.

summary.text: Tenants Housing Opportunity Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to waive the requirement that a family receiving section 8 project-based rental assistance receive one-year notice of assistance termination in order to facilitate such family's purchase of an assisted dwelling.

titles.title: To amend section 8 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to waive the requirement that a family receiving project-based rental assistance be notified one year in advance of termination of the contract for such assistance in cases in which such termination facilitates purchase of the home by the tenant.
